description: Occupying a 15C castle in a medieval village, this restaurant offers fine views of the majestic hills all around. The chef here uses top - quality regional ingredients with a focus on seasonal produce to create tasting menus full of imagination and artistic flair. Excellent meat and fish dishes inspired by Italian traditions.
